rule: The output should not consist of the input paragraph split into individual sentences.
input: Birds migrate seasonally. Patterns change yearly. Observations help scientists.
validityText:
The input provided consists of a paragraph of text. Upon evaluating the structure of the input, it is apparent that the paragraph contains three distinct sentences: "Birds migrate seasonally.", "Patterns change yearly.", and "Observations help scientists.". Each of these sentences represents a complete and coherent thought, as they are each made up of a subject and a predicate, fulfilling the sentence requirement.

According to the input specification, the input must be a paragraph containing at least three sentences. The given input satisfies this specification as it contains exactly three sentences, meeting the minimum requirement specified.

No violation.
OK
